name: Cuba Gooding
summary: Cuba Gooding. Soundtrack: Sudden Death. Cuba Gooding was born on 27 April 1944 in New York City, New York, USA. He was an actor, known for Sudden Death (1985), Thank God It's Friday (1978) and Children of the Struggle (1999). He was previously married to Shirley Sullivan and Gail Barbara Harris. He died on 20 April 2017 in Woodland Hills, California, USA.
